name: Nordenfelt (itch)
description:
A steampunk shoot 'em up game for Windows.

The game takes place in an alternative history where steam machines are still the state of the art. Mechanical behemoths are invading the lands, just waiting to get shredded to pieces.

It's your turn to strike back and shoot your way through masses of obscure vehicles while dodging hails of bullets. Unlock powerful equipment and send those intruders to hell even faster.

Features

  • unlock equipment after each completed level
  • bullet grazing: get higher scores by keeping close to enemy bullets
  • non-linear gameplay: tackle each level individually as often as you want
  • online leaderboard
  • to date unreleased energy weapons from Nik Tesla ;)

Contact

If you need help, want to share feedback or just want say 'Hi': support@nordenfelt-thegame.com
